communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All complaints/settlements related to Officer Bogdala including but not limited to an incident where he punched a woman in the face breaking her 
eye socket.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Yiliana (NU Fellow)

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: NASA support for 2023 film "The Marvels"
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All documents pertaining to collaboration between NASA and the production of the 2023 film "The Marvels," directed by Nia DaCosta. Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; photographs; and all records of communications between employees of NASA and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "The Marvels," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication. This film appears on a list, which I have attached, of NASA collaborations, under the year 2023.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation as well as the editor-in-chief and a contributor to a research magazine published by said foundation titled "Cultural Engineering Studies," and I have used documents released to me by NASA via FOIA in published research articles. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Student Assignment Presentations
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

1. Any/all Student Assignment presentations given within the Office for Students with Disabilities during the 2024-2025 and 2025-2026 (to date) school year. 

An example presentation that was given in 2022 is attached for reference. 

This request is filed on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

title: Air Force support for 2025 Netflix documentary "Air Force Elite: Thunderbirds"

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The following documents pertaining to Air Force collaboration with, or support for, the 2025 Netflix documentary "Air Force Elite: Thunderbirds," directed by Matt Wilcox: script notes; production assistance agreements; photographs; and records of communications between employees of the Air Force and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "Air Force Elite: Thunderbirds," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation as well as the editor-in-chief and a contributor to a research magazine published by said foundation titled "Cultural Engineering Studies." Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Student Assignment, OSD
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

In the CPS Procedural Manual, it states, "The IEP team then submits a school assignment request to ODLSS to provide the appropriate school closest to the student’s residence that can implement the IEP."

Provide records sufficient to show the following:

1. A blank form/submission for the school assignment request;
2. Anonymized data of all school assignment requests made on behalf of CPS students with IEPs requiring placement for the 2023-2024, 2024-2025, and 2025-2026 (to date) school years. These records should include a unique non-identifiable code for the student, the date their IEP was finalized, the date the school assignment request was made, the date the school assignment letter was issued, and the date the student enrolled.

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani
